short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: screenshots - from the screen, straight to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshots with a single button press.

Install this extension to easily take screenshots of your any website you want. You can directly copy the screenshot to your clipboard for convenience, after previewing what you have snapped.

This extension uses affiliate links to finance development cost. Sponsored Ad Links in search engines will be hidden to prevent bugs.
